title: Mathematics Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program Utilizing Social Media-Based Online Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and secondary-level mathematics knowledge
context.additional_context: Learners access social media platforms and VR simulation tools via personal smart devices, with a blended learning environment linked to three offline workshops weekly

learning_goals: Learners share math problem-solving strategies using social media-based collaboration tools and perform peer feedback at least three times.
Learners complete collaborative inquiry-based solutions to real-life math problems in a VR simulation environment with at least 80% proficiency.
Learners explain mathematical problem-solving processes in three or more stages (self-peer-instructor evaluation) through online collaboration and offline workshops.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
